name: Ohto Ai Music Bot
description: An Anime themed Telegram group call music player bot.

TOKEN.description: Your bot token. Get one from @BotFather duh

API_ID.description: Get API_ID from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

API_HASH.description: Get API_HASH from my.telegram.org, used for telethon based modules.

Sudo_users.description: Your user ID as an integer.

Group.description: The id where the bot will play

Max_Dur.description: The max duration of the video
